acceptance_criteria.deterministic_pass_condition: both lanes provide runtime provenance evidence with acceptable missing/invalid citation rates and complete traceability fields

notes: This summary is checklist-complete and reconciles blocked authority-command attempts with successful rerun evidence available in lane-local logs/backups. HOLD remains due to missing latency quantiles and harness-parity constraints, not due to missing provenance artifact fields. Traceability mapping is deterministic from run-manifest.json: trace_id=trace::{run_id}::{source_commit[0:12]}, parent_trace_id=source_commit::{source_commit[0:12]}.
